mapper.select: SELECT s.STUD_NO, s.USER_NO, s.PF_NO, s.NTN_CD, s.SCSBJT_NM, s.STUD_NM, s.TELNO, s.STUD_EML_ADDR, s.COL_REG, s.STUD_BRDT, s.STUD_GEN, n.NTN_NM, p.PF_NM FROM STUD_INFO s JOIN NATIONAL_INFO n ON s.NTN_CD = n.NTN_CD JOIN PF_INFO p on s.PF_NO = p.PF_NO
SELECT CSL_NO, CSL_NM, CSL_EMAIL, CSL_MOBILE, USER_NO FROM COUNSELOR

SELECT a.STUD_NO, a.GCOUN_CD, a.GCOUN_STA_NM, a.GCOUN_ATND_YN, a.GCOUN_ATND_STUD_RV, a.GCOUN_CSL_RV, DATE_FORMAT(a.GCOUN_CURRENT_DT, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') AS GCOUN_CURRENT_DT, i.SCSBJT_NM, i.STUD_GEN, i.TELNO, i.STUD_EML_ADDR, i.COL_REG, i.STUD_NM, gc.CSL_NO, gc.GCOUN_NM, gc.GCOUN_BGNG_DT, c.CSL_NM FROM GROUP_COUN_APPLICANT a JOIN STUD_INFO i ON a.STUD_NO = i.STUD_NO JOIN GROUP_COUN_INFO gc ON a.GCOUN_CD = gc.GCOUN_CD JOIN COUNSELOR c ON gc.CSL_NO = c.CSL_NO WHERE a.GCOUN_CD = #{gcounCd}

SELECT i.GCOUN_CD, i.CSL_NO, i.GCOUN_NM, DATE_FORMAT(i.GCOUN_DT, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') AS GCOUN_DT, i.GCOUN_BGNG_DT, i.GCOUN_DDLN_DT, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM GROUP_COUN_APPLICANT a WHERE a.GCOUN_CD = i.GCOUN_CD AND a.GCOUN_STA_NM = '신청중') AS GCOUN_REG_COUNT, i.GCOUN_CONTS_CN, i.GCOUN_DTL_CN, i.GCOUN_PROG_STA_NM, i.GCOUN_ATND_COUNT, c.CSL_NM, i.GCOUN_LMT_COUNT FROM GROUP_COUN_INFO i JOIN COUNSELOR c ON i.CSL_NO = c.CSL_NO

SELECT i.GCOUN_CD, i.CSL_NO, i.GCOUN_NM, DATE_FORMAT(i.GCOUN_DT, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') AS GCOUN_DT, i.GCOUN_BGNG_DT, i.GCOUN_DDLN_DT, i.GCOUN_LMT_COUNT, i.GCOUN_CONTS_CN, i.GCOUN_DTL_CN, i.GCOUN_PROG_STA_NM, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM GROUP_COUN_APPLICANT a WHERE a.GCOUN_CD = i.GCOUN_CD AND a.GCOUN_STA_NM = '신청중') AS GCOUN_REG_COUNT, i.GCOUN_ATND_COUNT, c.CSL_NM FROM GROUP_COUN_INFO i JOIN COUNSELOR c ON i.CSL_NO = c.CSL_NO JOIN USER u ON c.USER_NO = u.USER_NO WHERE u.LOGIN_ID = #{userId};
SELECT CSL_NO, CSL_NM FROM COUNSELOR c JOIN USER u ON c.USER_NO = u.USER_NO WHERE u.LOGIN_ID = #{userId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO GROUP_COUN_INFO (CSL_NO, GCOUN_NM, GCOUN_DT, GCOUN_BGNG_DT, GCOUN_DDLN_DT, GCOUN_LMT_COUNT, GCOUN_DTL_CN, GCOUN_CONTS_CN, GCOUN_FILENM) VALUES(#{CSL_NO}, #{GCOUN_NM}, #{GCOUN_DT}, #{GCOUN_BGNG_DT}, #{GCOUN_DDLN_DT}, #{GCOUN_LMT_COUNT}, #{GCOUN_DTL_CN}, #{GCOUN_CONTS_CN}, #{GCOUN_FILENM});
mapper.select: SELECT c.CSL_NM, e.CSL_NO, c.CSL_EMAIL, c.CSL_MOBILE, e.SCSBJT_NM FROM EMP_COUN_PRO e JOIN COUNSELOR c ON c.CSL_NO = e.CSL_NO
SELECT PST_SN, PST_TTL, WRITER, PST_COMP FROM ICOUN_POSTS WHERE WRITER = #{studentNo}
SELECT PST_SN, PST_TTL, PST_CAT, PST_CN, WRITER, PSTG_YMD, PST_COMP, BBS_SN FROM ICOUN_POSTS WHERE PST_SN_OLD = #{postId} AND PST_DEL = '1' ORDER BY PSTG_YMD DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ICOUN_POSTS WHERE WRITER = #{studentNo} AND PST_COMP = '미완료'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO COUNSELOR (CSL_NO, CSL_NM, CSL_EMAIL, CSL_MOBILE) VALUES (#{cslNo}, #{cslNm}, #{email}, #{mobile})
INSERT INTO EMP_COUN_PRO (CSL_NO, EMP_CSL_EM, EMP_CSL_TELNO, SCSBJT_NM, ECOUN_FILENM, ECOUN_CONTS_CN) VALUES (#{cslNo}, #{email}, #{mobile}, #{scsbjtNm}, #{ECOUN_FILENM}, #{fileUrl})
mapper.select:

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PF_SCHEDULE (PF_NO, PF_DATE, PF_TIME_CD) VALUES (#{PF_NO}, #{PF_DATE}, #{PF_TIME_CD});
mapper.select:
SELECT PCI.PF_COUN_NO, PCI.STUD_NO, SI.STUD_NM, SI.SCSBJT_NM, PCI.PF_NO, PI.PF_NM, PCI.PF_COUN_RSVT_YMD, PCI.PF_COUN_RSVT_TIME, PCI.PF_CONTENTS, PCI.PF_COUN_YMD, PCI.PF_COUN_TIME_CD, PCI.PF_COUN_COMMENT, PCI.PF_COUN_STATE_CD FROM PF_COUN_INFO PCI JOIN STUD_INFO SI ON PCI.STUD_NO=SI.STUD_NO JOIN PF_INFO PI ON PCI.PF_NO=PI.PF_NO
WHERE PCI.PF_NO = #{userId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PF_COUN_INFO (PF_NO, STUD_NO, PF_COUN_RSVT_YMD, PF_COUN_RSVT_TIME, PF_CONTENTS, PF_COUN_YMD, PF_COUN_TIME_CD, PF_COUN_COMMENT, PF_COUN_STATE_CD) VALUES (#{PF_NO}, #{STUD_NO}, #{PF_COUN_RSVT_YMD}, #{PF_COUN_RSVT_TIME}, #{PF_CONTENTS}, #{PF_COUN_YMD}, #{PF_COUN_TIME_CD}, #{PF_COUN_COMMENT}, #{PF_COUN_STATE_CD});
